Name: Harvester Trout
Description: It got its name for 'harvesting' crops and plants that grow near water. This destructive behavior means it's being regarded as a pest. Though it seems to be popular because of its tender oily meat.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Recibi√≥ su nombre por 'cosechar' cultivos y plantas que crecen cerca del agua. Este comportamiento destructivo significa que se lo considera una plaga. Aunque parece ser popular por su tierna carne aceitosa.
